name: Journey
overview:
A ball-shattering experience in sight and sound!

It is the year 20XX. After decades of touring the galaxy and splitting whole planets in twain with their majestic music, Journey has returned. This time with 12 hit tunes that will shake you to your very core and leave you waking up alone in a bog with absolutely no recollection of how you got there.

Stunning interactively and incredible, lifelike graphics allow you to jam with America's #1 rock group. This ultra-realistic virtual jukebox lets you shuffle the playlist for endless fun or loop a track and enjoy the sweet melodies. Invite friends over to relish in all the 8-bit glory and be the envy of your peers! In this realm, legends are made and broken in a fleeting moment... do you have what it takes to save the free world?

- Twelve exciting tracks!

- Super informative release notes!

- Easy for kids to use!
